Generated by DocFX

Class InteractionEvaluationEnvironment

Represents an environment encapsulating common entities used during the evaluation of Discord interactions.

Inheritance
object

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.OwnerOnly
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public sealed class InteractionEvaluationEnvironment
Remarks

This class provides streamlined access to frequently needed Discord entities such as the interaction, channel, guild, user, and client associated with a specific interaction context. It simplifies handling of interactions by centralizing access to these entities, making it easier to develop interaction-based commands.
